003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.luceneindex;
004
005import java.util.Set;
006
007import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.entity.ProcessedDocument;
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.AbstractProcessingStep;
009import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingStepService;
010import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.luceneindex.xml.definition.FolderPathProcessingStepParameter;
011import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
012
013/**
014 * The service implementation for this processing step.
015 *
016 * @author Alejandro González García
017 */
018public final class LuceneIndexProcessingStepService implements ProcessingStepService {
019        @Override
020        public AbstractProcessingStep create() {
021                return new LuceneIndexProcessingStep();
022        }
023
024        @Override
025        public String getName() {
026                return "LuceneIndex";
027        }
028
029        @Override
030        public Set<Class<? extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter>> getAdditionalParameters() {
031                return Set.of(FolderPathProcessingStepParameter.class);
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public Set<Class<? extends ProcessedDocument>> getProcessedDocumentTypes() {
036                return Set.of();
037        }
038}
